    • Method Detail

      • addPacket

        public void addPacket(int packetNumber,
                      byte[] packet)

        Adds a split packet to the container

        Parameters:
        packetNumber - The packet number
        packet - A byte array representing a single split-packet unit
        Throws:
        PacketSizeLimitException - thrown if the max number of allowed packets has been reached. This is usually specified by the protocol.

      • removePacket

        public void removePacket(int packetNumber)
        Parameters:
        packetNumber - The packet number to be removed

      • isComplete

        public boolean isComplete()
        Verify that we received all packets and no packets are missing
        Returns:
        Returns true if we have complete packets

        Returns the sum of each packets within this container

        Returns:
